website_summaries.verdict: Folding right down the middle, this bassinet can be set up and packed down in mere seconds. Many parents find it solid enough for home use as well as travel.
pros: Rocking option soothes baby to sleep
cons: Some buyers don't like the slight dip where the mattress folds

customer_reviews.title: Problem mattress. Safety concern
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet looks adorable but the functionality is disappointing . Pros: Looks adorable , sturdy, easy to move , canopy is great for blocking light Cons: the mattress has a huge split down the middle so I see why my infant hates laying in it , not comfortable looking at all. But the biggest flaw is the safety , my 3 week old infant cannot lay flat she winds up on her side or pressed against the sides. this is a HUGE safety problem . If this mattress was different it would be great but it’s going back
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Probably The Best Looking Bassinet I’ve Ever Seen. I Truly Love The Fact It Isn’t The Typical White Color Bassinets Tend To Be. Extremely Easy To Put Together And Wash! It’s Also Quite Big So, Baby Will Sleep In It Quite Some Time. Overall Best Gift We’ve Received Off Our Amazon Baby Registry!
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but didn't like mattress
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I love that it folds but I didn't like the split in the mattress. We had no problem taking out mattress to fold the bassinet. It was uncomfortable for baby so we tried a memory foam mattress and cut it to fit the bed. After that, baby loved sleeping in this. It was a great way to transition her into her crib.
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: Great and large bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: My baby boy has slept in this bassinet since we brought him home from the hospital. He’s 14 weeks old now and he still fits in it, with room to grow! We are renovating our house and are temporarily staying in an appartment so we are tight on space, so having this bassinet be able to fit next to our bed in our room has been a Godsend. The only thing that made me deduct one star was that the mattress pad is rather hard and thin, but it doesn’t bother my baby and as a matter a fact, he’s been sleeping through the night in his bassinet since he was 8 weeks old.
customer_reviews.author: Lou-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: its Cute and simple to put together but it dips in the middle making it hard for my newborn to sleep comfortably. I don’t recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: baby and momma love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. The baby loves this and is being transitioned to crib with the rocking motion. Very stable. You can turn the rockers on the bottom over to make it not rock.
customer_reviews.author: Katie1554

customer_reviews.title: Sheets hard to find
customer_reviews.text: Cute bassinet and easy to assemble. Tried to order sheets for it, but they were "unavailable". I read through several comments and found that changing pad covers would work, and they do work wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our newborn son. Very easy to assemble. Color design looks great. Easy to move around the room as needed. Bought mattress cover separately to cover the crib mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Hennebry

customer_reviews.title: Pretty bassinet with a flaw
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this bassinet. It's sturdy and pretty. The reason why I wanted it was to have one that could rock. However, if we put our newborn in, she'll immediately roll to one side of the crib. Now I have to leave it stationary, so she doesn't roll onto her tummy. I don't think it's the manufacturer's fault, but I just can't use it the way I intended to.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne T.

customer_reviews.title: *A VERY HONEST REVIEW👎🏽*
customer_reviews.text: LOOKS CHEAP IN PERSON! NOTHING LIKE THE ADVERTISEMENT! THE CANOPY DID NOT FIT! THE STRUCTURE OF THE BASSINET WAS JUST FRAIL LOOKING!!! (I DID LOVE THE FACT THAT IT WAS BIG & SPACIOUS👍🏽) but..... THERE WAS NOOO HESITATIONS TO RETURN THIS ITEM VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne L.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and good looking, but bottom is “meh”
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and sturdy, but the bottom seems uneven and it has a huge crack in the center- my baby was always rolling! Buy it if you plan on using it with a doc-a-tot or whatever, otherwise if you want to use as is, I would recommend getting something with a more comfortable/even mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Z.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: My sister got this same bassinet. Her baby loved it and I thought it would be perfect for us. I got it and I did not remember it being so BIG, but our home and room are smaller than hers, so it may just seem way big because of that. Other than it being a little big for our space, it’s perfect. It folds and rocks like it should and it’s firm. It’s lightweight too, just awkward to handle unfolded. The fabric of the mattress is that slick type that you can easily wipe off with a rag to clean and you can remove it to wash it if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney C

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this when my son was a new born. He isnbow 6 months and still sleeps in it. Although i didnt use it properly till he was about 2 months old as found the mattress to be a bit hard so i add a comforter to soften up a bit. But it is a worthy oruchase especially with the breathable mesh when my son puts his face to the corners at times when he is sleeping. Feels very spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Jemila Shaba

customer_reviews.title: Infant death trap!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this!!! My baby was in the death trap and she could have been severely injuries she only weighs 9lbs!!! I want my money back!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny! Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet!!! I was sceptical since I read the reviews about the handle but it no longer falls in between the mattress. It is now underneath and you move the mattress to access it. The size is bigger than a normal bassinet which allows baby to stay in it longer. Also it's still a perfect fit in our small master bedroom. Can't wait for my baby girl to enjoy her new bed. I say go for it! It's classy and sturdy and comes already assembled. No broken pieces here :)
customer_reviews.author: Christina H

customer_reviews.title: Love. But...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style of this bassinet, as it fits my decor in my bedroom. A couple things. I wish it had an awning to shield light and air. And I wish it where higher, and more bed level. I had a c-section and it was difficult to get my daughter in and out that first week of healing. So I wouldn’t recommended for post c-section.
customer_reviews.author: Charde Barrett

customer_reviews.title: A cradle to pass down
customer_reviews.text: This is big, big enough that the baby will be able to stay in the crib for many months, he is currently 4 months old and 14.5 pounds. It is sturdy, he likes to kick his legs up and down and bounce in it. it looks beautiful, I used it as a prop for pictures. very easy to clean. I think this will last the years and plan to use it for seconds.
customer_reviews.author: strega711

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, functional, and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous bassinet. It was super easy to assemble, and looks awesome. Of our crib, cosleeper, and this bassinet, this is the ONLY surface my week old baby will actually sleep in. While we’ve had it out since assembly, it does fold up almost completely flat for ease of storage. Really happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen❤️

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I somehow missed that it wasn’t entirely mesh on the sides and spend a lot of time worrying my newborn will suffocate against the sides. That being said, easy to assemble and move around.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: It’s very easy to assemble and put away.
customer_reviews.text: For people like us living in a condo without a lot of extra space, this works great! Bought at amazon warehouse open box, was perfect. Like new. Assembling very easy, the mattress pad it’s ok, not as bad as some people would say. We will add some customs sheets with padding to make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Restrepo

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent bassinet. Only big complaint is the hood isn’t shaped right, it’s bent up and such. I wish they had made the mattress with no crease; there is no need since you have to remove the mattress to fold it anyway. It seems sturdy and my wife likes the style.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for every day use
customer_reviews.text: Very huge! Are use this bassinet for my downstairs area! Second time buying it. For my third baby Now. Very spacious Definitely can use as the baby gets bigger The best bassinet for every day use Not good to put in the bedroom too low very hard to keep your eyes on baby if he or she is sleeping in the bedroom Four bedroom use I recommend Halo
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The dark wooden legs give it a high end look and feel, the entire bassinet is high quality. It is so simple to fold & move. I love that it rocks or stays stationary in a simple movement. I am so glad we chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tahj

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very big, but gets the job done. Doesnt carry well. I broke the middle handle the first time trying to pack it before my son was even born. However great bassinet so far. Mesh siding so baby could breath through if he was ever too turn into the bassinets side
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Cheyanne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bassinet for travel purposes. We were heading to Williamsburg and needed a travel bed for our baby. I absolutely loved this, but our baby wouldn't have enough space. I had to return it. This would've been a great option when our baby was 0-6 months. Will buy again if we decided to have another child.
customer_reviews.author: Barpos

customer_reviews.title: Reeks of harsh chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: The starts I am giving are for how cute the bassinet is. I like how simple and pretty the design is. Does not rock well when flipped to the rocker bottoms but I wanted a stationary bassinet. HOWEVER, the material of bassinet reeks of harsh chemical smell even after washing. The bassinet sheets I washed in the same load came out reeking of the harsh chemical smell as well. I can’t put my newborn in this. Returning this item today.
customer_reviews.author: runboston

customer_reviews.title: Compact and cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bassinet. We used it when we moved and it was easy to fold up and put in the car. The baby slept good in it. Its a good size bassinet. The only complaint I had is that it didn’t lay perfectly flat, it dipped a little in the middle where it folds in half. It wasn’t bad enough to be unsafe.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe and comforting for the baby
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my friend for a baby gift, she absolutely loved it. So it was the best thing with a newborn. She uses it by her bed at night so that she could feel the baby close
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and travels great
customer_reviews.text: So easy to break down and move, light, and compact. This makes it amazing to know you can take the babies bed with you anywhere. It is very sturdy. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I love this bassinet. This is a must have for a newborn. Easy to move from one room to another. Very nice fabrics. Reasonnable price. This is just what I was looking for and was expecting. Fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mélissa LE LEIZOUR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great size and solid quality. Easy to assemble and not too heavy to move around. I have this in our master bedroom for my newborn, while the crib is in the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bassinet. Super light, cute and sturdy. Be careful when folding it up because it’s a finger pincher. But that’s my only complaint! Still so glad I bought it-and at such a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my expecting daughters. They seem to be a good value so far. Babies aren’t due until May but they set them up and are very nice. Good quality for the price and something you use short term before they graduate to a crib.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product!! We co-sleep with our three year old so if felt right to have the new baby in the room with us. This does not take up much room but he will be able to sleep in it safely for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bassinet. Good quality and easy to fold. However, I find it a little heavy to make it a mobile bassinet. Overall, nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic of USA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for, a simple bedside rocking bassinet. Also nice that it folds up easily in case you need to take it somewhere, store it away, etc.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but fragile
customer_reviews.text: It was great for three months, then my 5yo leaned on the edge and it broke spectacularly. Really unimpressed with the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this portable baby bed/bassinette...used it for our new Grandson...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best bassinet/sleeper I’ve ever bought. I’ve had 3 kids and wish I would have had this for all of them!!! It’s by far my most favorite thing I’ve owned as a mom. Mad well, and such a great price!! Get yourself one, you’ll be grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: we love it for our daughter is very strong an very good material plus it looks very elegant thanks we love it
customer_reviews.author: raymond

customer_reviews.title: Durable, good quality but doesn’t rock well
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, but pretty bulky and don’t purchase it for the rocking feature.
customer_reviews.author: BrennaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver. My baby is 4 months now. We’ve been in it for two month and she still had so much room to grow. I wanted something she could sleep in for a while. We loved out rock and play but she outgrew it very fast. My husband travels a lot with work and this is very easy to travel with. It folds up easy and doesn’t take up a lot of space! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two for my twins but eventually returned one of them. They did not seem to care for it. The bottom where they lay seems a little hard
customer_reviews.author: meghan lally

customer_reviews.title: Not too small, not too big
customer_reviews.text: It's just perfect for my newborn while he sleeps in our bedroom. I love that we can take it downstairs without issues. Easy to fold and we found covers that fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately way too big for what we were looking for. Make sure to check out the dimensions before ordering- that’s where I went wrong.
customer_reviews.author: DOlek

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeping option!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for baby to sleep in your room before transitioning to a crib or for travel. Item is easy to assemble, clean and fold for storage. Nice replacement option for the rock n play recall.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bassinet the only thing I wish was different was the range of motion when it came to rocking it only rocks just a tiny bit which I feel like my any barley feels so it’s kind of a pointless feature and was what I really wanted it for. Other than that it is made well and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what to look for in a bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely loved this bassinet! Our boy went from our bed to his crib so we didn’t need it anymore but if I ever needed another one, after 4 failed bassinets I would now pick this one every time
customer_reviews.author: Breann

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bassinet, spacious, newborn sleeps great in it and I can keep it by my bedside for nighttime feedings. I like the rocking feature so I can reach over and rock her gently if she fusses overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Mercer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, enough space for my 3 month old to roll from side to side (he can't roll all the way over yet). Sturdy enough that my 2.5 year old climbed in and it held him (he's 29 lbs) and the then-2 month old without bending under the weight. Good but and easy to move around, even pack for road trips
customer_reviews.author: Esther Wright

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: My niece was so happy to receive this great item. It is a great baby shower gift
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Weatherford

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Big and easy folding , love it very strong and comfortable for baby
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Love the canopy, the color and classic look. We place a blanket over the canopy and across to block light when we’re in room When using a night lamp. I loved that it can sway, although a bit noisy. Placed a rug underneath and solved the problem + added charm!
customer_reviews.author: Ketty

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Our newborn loves it, it looks nice in our room and we can use it for a while due to how large it is. We receive many compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: this bassinet is the perfect size, foldable, lightweight but sturdy. Very comfy for baby and so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this! Super great product to have on hand for guests with babies, way easier to pop up than a big pack n play and takes less room to store also. Every baby seems very comfortable sleeping in it!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah Bria

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Easily put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easily put together. Easy to fold up and move around. Plenty roomy for my 18.3 lb 27in 6 month old. Needed a smaller bed than the regular pack n play to fit in our travel rv. Good price. Good colors. Sturdy. Over all pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mistydw81

customer_reviews.title: Nice bassinet!.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bassinet, large and comfortable. Baby easy can sleep there up to 5-6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: If it was up to me, I would put a doble cushion, to make softer for the baby
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: great Price! woth it
customer_reviews.text: a gift for grandbaby! very convenient and its large enough for baby for a few months..
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Barr

customer_reviews.title: Ouch my toes!
customer_reviews.text: My SO and I have stubbed our toes on this huge thing about a dozen times each!! Ouch! Not to mention baby hates this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie

customer_reviews.title: It is safe for an infant.
customer_reviews.text: Well so far no complaints. It is very easy to move around. Recommended for babies. My son is comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: CASANDRA CUNNINGHAM

customer_reviews.title: Looks nothing like a "nursery" item!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, there is a strong smell when you first open the packaging~ but once the washable items are washed and the whole thing allowed to "air out" the smell is gone. My granddaughter is due the end of May so I have time. It is a beautiful bassinet and very roomy. The rocking motion is very slight...just enough to coax a baby back to sleep once you've put them down (after really rocking them to sleep in a rocking chair).
customer_reviews.author: Annette L.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I want my baby girl to born to use it
customer_reviews.author: becka

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest bassinet I've ever laid eyes on. However, you run into trouble with the mattress inside. Since there's a divot where it folds, it's super easy for baby to roll over to the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Michaellena

customer_reviews.title: Such a nice and cozy basinet
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it... its so nice fabric and wood. The product has beautiful color too. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Semramis Alagoz

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was fast. Packing was great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my niece. Easy to set up, nice and sturdy and my niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: 🌺👑BO§ᴿᴬᴵ8Ø8

customer_reviews.title: Nice bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and size of this bassinet. It was easy for dad to assemble. The colors are neutral. The only thing that I would change is the pad. I wish it was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Esther B. Wooley

customer_reviews.title: Great bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: This has been working great for our child to sleep in and having them close to the bed for night feedings. Great bassinet! It does take up space though, and is a larger bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bassinet! Beautiful design and very functional. I have it set as so I can rock and I love it because every time my baby moves it rocks him, soothing him and making fall asleep giving me a couple more minutes of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: love this bassinet for my baby girl ! It was very easy to assemble all i had to do was fold it out and we where done ! Its also way bigger then I thought which is a plus !
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The bassinet was beautiful, true to size and easy to assemble. I had to send it back because I purchased a pack and play that included a bassinet. I really wanted to keep it though.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to travel with. Worked perfect for transitional time from rock n play to crib.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Campo

customer_reviews.title: But it is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it would rock on its own. But it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Best bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: Best bassinet we've ever owned - and it's stylish too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: Deep bassinet wish the legs were longer to fit better beside bed. Recommend getting sheets base of bassinet is rough. Wish I would’ve had for babies 1& 2
customer_reviews.author: Nicky C.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good for bedside and large size will work for a while. I do not like the ridge that goes across middle of bassinet when assembled. It seems less Than ideal for comfort
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer: )
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was on time and product was as described. Satisfied customer : )
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and store
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I use this in my living room for my granddaughter. It is beautifully designed!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Spikes

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Looks just like the item that is shown in the picture! It is actually bigger than I thought and I’m sure my baby will enjoy sleeping in this.
customer_reviews.author: Faidat Langston

customer_reviews.title: So much for back sleeping
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today. We set it up and I payed down my infant son only 4 days old and it's so uneven that he rolled from the middle on his back to his face into the side. This make me incredibly nervous and I will be sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S. Dudnheoffer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Although bassinet appeals to the eye it’s not very functional.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bedside
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter, she is very happy with it. Nice size and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Cross

customer_reviews.title: So sweet !
customer_reviews.text: So cute ♥️ Can’t wait for my new grandson to use it !
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth price however the tax is ridiculous for the product

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing and still very pleased. Very spacious and deep. Sleek look and easy to store away.

customer_reviews.title: Real Wood is nice and looks great
customer_reviews.text: 4 star coz its too heavy for me to move one to other place other than that great product

customer_reviews.title: Best travel bed
customer_reviews.text: A great travel bed for babies! Very easy to fold and fits in every trunk!

customer_reviews.title: Practical and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks. Very comfortable for a baby. Very easy to store and put away. My grandson love to sleep there.

customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and the perfect size for traveling. Even though thos bassinet is small, it is very sturdy and we'll built

customer_reviews.title: Great size to have in master bedroom.
customer_reviews.text: We really love this bassinet. It's bigger than we thought so will be able to use longer.

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is absolutely gorgeous! Very sturdy and bigger than the average size bassinet.

customer_reviews.text: This was amazing and easy to move around the house and in the cat.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bassinet until my son grew out of it 🥺🥺such a lovely bassinet

customer_reviews.text: Great quality!! Looks nice and larger than expected. Worth the money!!

customer_reviews.text: Huge, lots of space. Baby can sleep in this for while.

customer_reviews.text: I love this it has been so useful for use at home and travel

product_meta.title: Ingenuity Foldaway Rocking Wood Bassinet - Wallace - Portable Folding Rocking Bassinet.
product_meta.description: Style:Wood - WallaceEnjoy more peaceful moments from naptime to nighttime. With its smart design, this bassinet is a dream for parents and babies. The unique foldable frame collapses, so you can move the bassinet seamlessly from room to room. This breathable fabric is also made to promote airflow, giving baby a cooler and comfortable space to rest. When baby is this calm, everyone can rest easy.
feature_bullets: More airflow keeps baby more comfortable
Rocking soothes baby; locks in place when asleep
Portable design folds for easy transport and storage
Spacious cradle for more comfortable sleep environment
Beautiful and neutral design for boy or girl

specifications.Care instructions: Bassinet Fabrics – Remove from frame. Machine wash with cold water, gentle cycle. No bleach. Air dry flat. Spot clean with a soft, clean cloth and mild soap. Mattress – Remove from Bassinet Fabrics. Remove structural boards. Fasten all hook and-loop patches. Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle. No bleach. Air dry flat. Spot clean with a soft, clean cloth and mild soap.
